original_text: As they were untying the colt, its owners asked them, “Why are you untying the colt?”
korean_text: 나귀 새끼를 풀 때에 그 임자들이 이르되 어찌하여 나귀 새끼를 푸느냐

sentences.original_text: As they were untying the colt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나귀 새끼를 풀고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Why are you untying the colt?
